description: A controversial statue of the Virgin Mary erected in the 17th Century is hoisted back in Prague.
title: Prague Catholic statue torn down by mob rises again
title_page: Prague Catholic statue torn down by mob rises again - BBC News
maintext: It was opposed by both atheists - the Czech Republic is said to have more non-believers than anywhere in the world except North Korea - and representatives of Protestant churches. There were even scuffles on the square between supporters and opponents.
